message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $13,000. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,250?
I'm not sure $11,250 is a good fit for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.
